nodes.text: Eldewn and Elsae Sarvool, Twin Runaways

Eldewn and Elsae Sarvool, Twin Runaways is the seventh installment in the Wizards of the Coast column "Bounty Postings." Written by Eric Cagle and published on December 16, 2008, it provided a bio and stats for the force-sensitive twins Eldewn Sarvool and Elsae Sarvool.
